changelog.title: Improvements & Fixes
copy: The Work Out button on the Routine page works as expected.

changelog.title: What’s New
copy: Build recurring Training Plans on a flexible timeline.

Refined Ongoing Workout card in This Week.

copy: More accurate prediction of upcoming workouts.
